articles.author: Lifestyle Asia
articles.title: Google’s AI chatbot, Bard, is now called Gemini and will have a new paid version - Lifestyle Asia India
articles.description: Google is rebranding it's AI chatbot Bard as Gemini and will soon launch a paid version. More details about the direct competitor of ChatGPT.
articles.content: Major changes are in store for Bard, Google’s AI chatbot and a direct competitor to ChatGPT. Like its rival, Bard will soon propose a paid version, as well as a dedicated mobile application. It will … [+1663 chars]
